Description: Thin box; bronze; rectangular; on the front the embossed figure of St George riding to left and spearing the dragon, with Greek inscription; reverse, an incised cross fleury with two Instruments of the Passion (the lance and the reed).
Bibliographic references: Grüneisen 1930 / Art chrétien primitif du haut et du bas moyen-âge: introduction et catalogue raisonné (176)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Baron Wladimir de Grüneisen (Sale)
Acquisition notes: De Gruneisen Sale 2 July 1929, lot.104, cat.177.
